column2: New Avatar Engine with playable avatars! If you play an Avatar and die, you reincarnate into a newborn Avatar from a new family in the next element in the cycle. §R(WARNING, still in alpha)§!
Old Avatar Engine §Rwithout§! playable avatars! You will §Rnot§! reincarnate into a new avatar after death of the previous one §R(WARNING, we don't recommend you to play with the old avatar engine)§!
A series of dynamic events and decisions meant to replicate the canon history of the Avatar universe are enabled.
A series of dynamic events and decisions meant to replicate the canon history of the Avatar universe are disabled.
The chance of a child inheriting their parent's bending or developing it independently are aligned as closely as possible with canon.
There is an increased chance of a child developing bending.
Only children of benders will have the chance to develop bending.
After some time, depending on the life span of the pet, it will die, and you will receive an event about it
Pets die only with the death of their owner
Pets will have mixed (both English and Eastern) names.
Pets will have Eastern (Chinese, Sanskrit, Tibetan) names.
The default setting closely models the decentralised nature of the Earth Kingdom.
This rule has the Earth Kingdom start as a united entity under the Earth King.
This rule has the Earth Kingdom in such a dire situation that all territories beyond Ba-Sing-Se are independent.
All events are enabled, providing the most content and best experience. Events concerning parts of the Avatar universe considered non-canon are enabled.
Events that are are possible within the Avatar Universe but not strictly canon will be enabled.
Events are strictly in line with what is considered canon for the Avatar universe.
Epidemics are enabled and more deadly ones will arrive after a certain amount of time.
Epidemics will not play an important part in the game and will be rare.
Epidemics are increased in frequency and are far more deadly.
Deaths of important characters will happen according to their history death date
